title: My pixal phone speaker not work properly for updated after new version 11 please fix my problem .
content:
My pixal 3a phone's speaker went bad.In my Pixel phone. The speaker problem has occurred. Since i! Android XI! System is updated. Since then? My phone voice!
sometimes! Is closed. and then? When I switch off the phone and open it. Then the voice returns. And after a day or two.
again? Same thing happens. Please tell me What should i do
I bought this phone 5 months ago. Please tel me
